description.narrative: This activity (Procurement of Services Implementation Phase) is a component of Creating Opportunities for Sustainable Spending on Roads (CROSSROADS) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £12,343,466. This component benefits Uganda, and works in the following sector(s): Transport policy and administrative management, Road transport. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development, Crown Agents Limited, DAI Europe, IMC Worldwide. The start date is 05-07-2010 and the end date is 31-10-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
